steps.title: Add the meat
steps.description: Add 80% lean ground beef to a large bowl

steps.title: Add species
steps.description: Add Worcestershire sauce, seasoning salt, garlic powder, and pepper

steps.title: Mix it!
steps.description: Mix with your hands until well combined

steps.title: Grill it!
steps.description: Grill over medium-high heat for about 4 minutes on each side.

steps.title: Finish it!
steps.description: Top with your favorite traditional burger toppings (lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, ketchup, etc.)
